Title: Mortal Recoil
Writer: Mark Banker (story), Patrick McHale (story), Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Cole Sanchez, Jesse Moynihan
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Hynden Walch
Plot: With the evil Lich seemingly defeated, Finn and Jake are uneasy with their success because of its great cost.
